name: Portal Journey: Portarius
description: Open a portal and begin your journey! Teleport rocks, water and your spaceship. Immerse in handcrafted colorful worlds, solve puzzles and be the first at the center of the Earth.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows 7, Windows 10 Processor: Core2Duo Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 128mb Storage: 400 MB available space
